name: KBSNews

”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”

skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: KBS (Korea Broadcasting System) is the Korean public broadcasting service station. KBS provides accurate and reliable news and information you want to know. We would be the source for breaking news, analysis, exclusive interviews, headlines and videos. Understand the world through expert reporting and storytelling with KBS. All Content is provided in Korean.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
